attributes.action: Remove Britain From The European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Petition Was Created to try and get Britain its freedom back, So us Britons can have a greater say in what happens to our country without other countries deciding for us also to give us back our jobs from the increasing amount of Foreign people that have taken them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
